summary: ALL FOUR  WHEEL RIMS WERE BENT,  WHICH CAUSED THE CONSUMER TO  PURCHASE NEW TIRES. DEALER NOTIFIED.   *AK   ALL 5 RIMS WERE BENT.  BUT NO FLATS.  THE CONSUMER BOUGHT A NEW RIM TWO AND A HALF YEARS AGO AND IN MAY BOUGHT FOUR NEW MICHELIN TIRES 245/75/16 MLS. AT NTB WHO SHOWED THE CONSUMER THE BENT RIMS.  THE VEHICLE CONTINUED TO VIBRATE.  THE CONSUMER THOUGHT THE NEW TIRES WOULD SOLVE THE VIBRATION PROBLEM, BUT IT DIDN'T.  THE VEHICLE ALSO NEEDED A NEW TRANSMISSION.   *SCC  *JB
